menu.name: Classic American
menu.description: A juicy beef patty topped with fresh lettuce, ripe tomatoes, melted cheese, and tangy pickles.

menu.name: BBQ Deluxe
menu.description: Succulent beef patty, crispy bacon, melted cheese, caramelized onions, and our signature BBQ sauce.

menu.name: Fiery Jalapeño
menu.description: Flame-grilled beef patty topped with jalapeño peppers, pepper jack cheese, spicy mayo.

menu.name: The Big 'n' Juicy
menu.description: A double beef patty, crispy bacon, melted cheese, fresh lettuce, tomato, and our special sauce.

menu.name: Swiss Melt
menu.description: A juicy beef patty smothered in melted Swiss cheese, caramelized onions, sautéed mushrooms.

menu.name: Veggie Bliss
menu.description: Packed with grilled vegetables, avocado, lettuce, tomato, and a drizzle of zesty herb sauce.

menu.name: Garden Gast
menu.description: Topped with crisp lettuce, juicy tomatoes, sliced cucumbers, and our signature garden sauce.

menu.name: Dirty Fries
menu.description: A combination of crispy french fries topped with melted cheese, crispy bacon bits.

menu.name: Amazing Fries
menu.description: Crispy on the outside, and fluffy on the inside, making them the ultimate sidekick to any burger.

menu.name: Frida
menu.description: A refreshing and flavorful beer. This golden brew offers a smooth and crisp taste

menu.name: Olipop
menu.description: This delightful soda is a refreshing beverage that will tantalize your taste buds with every sip.

menu.name: Calpis
menu.description: A revitalizing energy drink. This drink is designed to keep you focused and energized throughout your day.

menu.name: Tropical Bliss
menu.description: Transport yourself to a tropical paradise with every sip of our Tropical Bliss Iced Tea.
